'''House Thorne''' is a vassal house to [[House Baratheon of King's Landing]]. It is located within the [[Crownlands]] and holds fealty directly to the [[Iron Throne]].
sections.In the books:
As a vassal house sworn to [[King's Landing]], House Thorne contributed troops to the defense of the city during the [[Sack of King's Landing]]. Ser Alliser Thorne was on the walls when the [[House Lannister|Lannister]] troops stormed the [[Red Keep]]. He was wounded, captured, and later given the choice between taking the black or being executed. He chose the black.

Nothing else is known about the family save their arms - a silver flail on a red background - and the fact that they still exist.

A historial member of the house is Ser Rickard Thorne, a [[knight]]Â of the [[Kingsguard]] who served during the reign of King Viserys I and chose to side with King [[Aegon II Targaryen|Aegon II]] during the Dance of the Dragons.Â
sections.Members: * Ser [[Alliser Thorne]], a sworn brother of the [[Night's Watch]], former [[Master-at-Arms]] of [[Castle Black]].
